Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Specify a list of words that should be considered as optional when found in the query. This list will be

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: minProximity
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Configure the precision of the proximity ranking criterion. By default, the minimum (and best) proximity value

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: removeWordsIfNoResults
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Configure the way query words are removed when the query doesnt retrieve any results. This option can be used

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: disableTypoToleranceOnAttributes
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: List of attributes on which you want to disable typo tolerance (must be a subset of the searchableAttributes

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: removeStopWords
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Remove stop words from query before executing it.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: disableExactOnAttributes
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: List of attributes on which you want to disable computation of the exact ranking criterion

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: exactOnSingleWordQuery
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: This parameter control how the exact ranking criterion is computed when the query contains one word.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: alternativesAsExact
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Specify the list of approximation that should be considered as an exact match in the ranking formula.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: page
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Pagination parameter used to select the page to retrieve. Page is zero-based and defaults to 0. Thus, to

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: hitsPerPage
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Pagination parameter used to select the number of hits per page. Defaults to 20.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: offset
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Offset of the first hit to return (zero-based).

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: length
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Maximum number of hits to return. (1000 is the maximum)

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: attributesToRetrieve
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: List of object attributes you want to retrieve (let you minimize the answer size). You can also use * to

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: attributesToHighlight
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: List of attributes you want to highlight according to the query. If an attribute has no match for the query,

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: attributesToSnippet
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: List of attributes to snippet alongside the number of words to return (syntax is attributeName:nbWords).

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: getRankingInfo
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: If set to true, the result hits will contain ranking information in _rankingInfo attribute.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: highlightPreTag
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Specify the string that is inserted before the highlighted parts in the query result (defaults to <em>).

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: highlightPostTag
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Specify the string that is inserted after the highlighted parts in the query result (defaults to </em>)

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: snippetEllipsisText
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: String used as an ellipsis indicator when a snippet is truncated (defaults to empty).

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: restrictHighlightAndSnippetArrays
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Restrict arrays in highlight and snippet results to items that matched the query. (defaults to false).

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: numericFilters
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Filter on numeric attributes.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: tagFilters
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Filter the query by a set of tags.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: distinct
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Enable the distinct feature (disabled by default) if the attributeForDistinct index setting is set. This

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: facets
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: List of object attributes that you want to use for faceting. Only attributes that have been added in

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: facetFilters
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Filter the query by a list of facets.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: maxValuesPerFacet
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Limit the number of facet values returned for each facet. For example: maxValuesPerFacet=10 will retrieve

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: facetingAfterDistinct
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Force faceting to be applied after de-duplication.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: filters
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Filter the query with numeric, facet or/and tag filters.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: aroundLatLng
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Search for entries around a given latitude/longitude. You can specify the maximum distance in meters with the

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: aroundLatLngViaIP
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Same than aroundLatLng but using IP geolocation instead of manually specified latitude/longitude.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: aroundRadius
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Control the radius associated with a aroundLatLng or aroundLatLngViaIP query.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: aroundPrecision
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Control the precision of a aroundLatLng query. In meter. For example if you set aroundPrecision=100, two

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: minimumAroundRadius
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Define the minimum radius used for aroundLatLng or aroundLatLngViaIP when aroundRadius is not set. The

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: insideBoundingBox
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Search for entries inside a given area defined by the two extreme points of a rectangle.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: insidePolygon
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Search entries inside a given area defined by a union of polygons.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: sortFacetValuesBy
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Controls how the facet values are sorted within each faceted attribute.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: responseFields
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Choose which fields the response will contain. Applies to search and browse queries.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: maxFacetHits
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Maximum number of facet hits to return during a search for facet values.

Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: percentileComputation
Classes/Query.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Whether to include the query in processing time percentile computation.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: init(query:)
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Construct a query with the specified full text query.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: init(copy:)
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Clone an existing query.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: copy(with:)
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Support for NSCopying.

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: parse(_:)
Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Parse a query from a URL query string.

Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: addObject(_:withID:requestOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Add an object to this index, assigning it the specified object ID.

Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: getObject(withID:attributesToRetrieve:requestOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Get an object from this index, optionally restricting the retrieved content.

Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: getObjects(withIDs:attributesToRetrieve:requestOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Get several objects from this index, optionally restricting the retrieved content.

Classes/Index.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.name: setSettings(_:forwardToReplicas:requestOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Index.html#/s:26InstantSearchCli.abstract: Set this index’s settings, optionally forwarding the change to replicas.

Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: clearIndex(requestOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Delete the index content without removing settings and index specific API keys.

Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: waitTask(withID:requestOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Wait until the publication of a task on the server (helper).

Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: searchDisjunctiveFaceting(_:disjunctiveFacets:refinements:requestOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Perform a search with disjunctive facets, generating as many queries as number of disjunctive facets (helper).

Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: searchCacheEnabled
Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Whether the search cache is enabled on this index. Default: false.

Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.name: searchCacheExpiringTimeInterval
Classes/Index.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchCl.abstract: Expiration delay for items in the search cache. Default: 2 minutes.

Classes/Client/MultipleQueriesStrategy.h.name: none
Classes/Client/MultipleQueriesStrategy.h.abstract: Execute the sequence of queries until the end.

Classes/Client/MultipleQueriesStrategy.h.name: stopIfEnoughMatches
Classes/Client/MultipleQueriesStrategy.h.abstract: Execute the sequence of queries until the number of hits is reached by the sum of hits.

Classes/Client.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchC.name: index(withName:)
Classes/Client.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchC.abstract: Obtain a proxy to an Algolia index (no server call required by this method).

Classes/Client.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchC.name: multipleQueries(_:strategy:requestOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/c:@M@InstantSearchC.abstract: Query multiple indexes with one API call.

Classes/Client.html#/s:26InstantSearchCl.name: multipleQueries(_:strategy:requestOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:26InstantSearchCl.abstract: Query multiple indexes with one API call.

Classes/Query.html.name: Query
Classes/Query.html.abstract: Describes all parameters of a search query.

Other Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
